name: A Few Too Many Pumpkins
description:
This game is currently in alpha. You can unlock 8 weapons and 3 skins and can play in one map. Follow the game's page to stay updated on new content!

Overview:

The Pumpkin Lord turns your harmless crops into living monsters to invade your farm.

Grab your guns, buckle your seatbelt and fend off the pumpkin horde in this explosive arcade shooter!

Gameplay:

An endless horde of enemies swarm your farm.

Defend yourself with 8 different weapons, from a big bazooka to a precision sniper rifle! Pick up boxes to increase your score and get a new weapon!

Unlock new weapons by picking up more boxes, beat your high score and fight against the Pumpkin Lord in A Few Too Many Pumpkins!

Credits: Code, Art and Game Design by Eduard "cakeu" Diconi
Additional Art by José "Soulsciety" Parés
https://www.twitch.tv/soulsciety
Music by Joan Atlas
https://joanatlas.bandcamp.com
